author: Kevin Stankiewicz
title: CEO of spice maker McCormick: 'We've lived all phases of this crisis' and China is coming back
description: "All of our facilities are open. People are back at work. We're operating normally" in China, McCormick & Company CEO Lawrence Kurzius told CNBC.
content:
McCormick & Company Chairman and CEO Lawrence Kurzius said Thursday the spice maker's business in China has improved in recent weeks as that country emerges from the coronavirus outbreak. 
"We've lived all three phases of this crisis," he said on CNBC's … [+2749 chars]
